content: a sweet little granny square to have fun with pixie wings is a classic polly plum square in a tiny package pixie wings was designed as part of the melange cal from underground crafter 1 <hr> this pattern pdf is totally free to you right here on ravelry no account is needed to download the pdf - just click the free ravelry download link above <hr> visit me polly plum get help or support and stay up to date on new patterns by checking out my website 2 everytrickonthehook for things like tutorials and free patterns liking every trick on the hook on facebook 3 following polly_plum_crochet on instagram 4 visiting polly s place on ravelry 5 or get lots of help and support from the facebook group polly plum pattern posse 6 you can see all of my patterns on my designer page on ravelry 7 1 https //www ravelry com/discuss/underground-crafter/topics/4236225 2 everytrickonthehook com 3 https //www facebook com/everytrickonthehook/ 4 https //www instagram com/polly_plum_crochet/ 5 http //www ravelry com/groups/pollys-place 6 https //www facebook com/groups/pollyplumcrochetpatterns/ 7 http //www ravelry com/designers/polly-plum
